MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G12 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Great Western Terrace and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete the repair, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:30pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm for the customer dropped at 4:30pm and for the original fault the repair is estimated to be completed by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:40 PM on Thursday, 15 October 2020
